title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 March 2009 - XWiki
content: sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:12): flori1: We don't really assign mentors to students, we do development in the middle of the community; the official mentors assigned to a project are the ones with the most knowledge about that project sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:13): And we have 2 people that can guide the XOO development best sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:13): Florin, who developed XWord sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:14): And Asiri, who has worked with OpenOffice on the Office Import project flori1 - (28/03/2009 00:14): That's me. That's why i'm asking. I need Asiri to have a close look on this. sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:14): Oh sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:14): Hi Florin flori1 - (28/03/2009 00:14): hi sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:15): So you two will be leading this, if we get a student for it sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:15): Is that OK with you? flori1 - (28/03/2009 00:16): sure flori1 - (28/03/2009 00:17): I have a question. What will it take to have the new rendering features in xml-rpc? sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:18): Very little I guess sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 00:18): You should ask Fabio flori1 - (28/03/2009 00:18): Then i'll come with a proposal on devs flori1 - (28/03/2009 00:18): Both XOffice and XOO will need this amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:38): hi arunreddy - (28/03/2009 05:38): amila325 : hi amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:39): i setuped apache maven arunreddy - (28/03/2009 05:39): ok amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:39): but i can't get the source of amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:39): photoalbum application arunreddy - (28/03/2009 05:39): you trying to build xwiki from source amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:39): im using netbeans 6.5 amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:39): actually im trying to get familier amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:39): with old xwiki photo album amila325 - (28/03/2009 05:40): i got this svn link yesterday amila325 - (28/03/2009 19:37): hello sdumitriu sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 19:37): Hi ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:37): did you get my email? sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 19:38): Let me check ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:38): ok :) sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 19:40): Yes sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 19:40): It's too early to tell ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:40): ok, thank you ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:40): now i have some questions abut the project ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:40): you told me that there already is a captcha implementation ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:41): where can i read about it? ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:41): this only if there are useful ideas in it sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 19:42): http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/core/trunk/xwiki-core/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/plugin/captcha/ ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:43): great!, thank you ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:43): let me some .. i think i had other questions too :) ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:44): i was also thinking about the following thing .. and can you kindly give me your feedback? ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:45): for each user .. after few edits .. someone can check his edits ... and we can create for each user some kind of flag .. trustful, medium, spammer .. and for each type to have diferent options ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:46): for example for a medium user .. not very trustful, but not spammer ... we can allow him a certain number of edits per period ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:47): and for spammers .. only one in a long time .. to give him the chance to reabilitate ... ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:47): because maybe one user will actually want to use his accont in good purposes .. but if we don't allow him any actions .. he will have to create another user ... and will cost some time for both parties ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:48): and we can create a table where, for each user we associate this flag ... and when he logs in .. he gets his personalized options ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:49): what do you think? ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:56): sdumitriu, oh i forgot to mention something .. someone will check only those users that are flagged with medium by the spam detector ... ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 19:57): because not all messages are obvious spams .. and can pass the detector xwikibot - (28/03/2009 19:58): XWiki.MafazHassan was modified by XWiki.MafazHassan (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/MafazHassan vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:16): sdumitriu: I think it's important for the antispam stuff that all students reuse existing things and not reinvent anything. Reputation based system exists, antispam filters exists (typepad antispam, etc). I haven't followed the discussion but I know people have a tendency to reinvent things in general :) ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:17): vmassol ... where can i find all that already exists? vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:18): ancutagheorghe: on the web, you can use google for example ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:18): no, i mean all the things that already exist al xwiki ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:18): at vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:19): at xwiki the best is http://xwiki.org ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:19): :) thank you vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:19): and then the mailing list archives at http://xwiki.markmail.org ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:19): thank you ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:20): i got the email about typepad .. i will google it to learn more about it vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:20): and then... the source :) ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:20): thank you for that too :) vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:20): you're welcome sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 20:23): vmassol: You're right sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 20:24): But not everything can be reused vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:24): of course, but it should be checked if it can first sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 20:24): ancutagheorghe: Again, I'm not sure that creating a new table is needed sdumitriu - (28/03/2009 20:24): We already have objects ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:25): ok i will keep that in mind :) ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:25): what do you think about the rest of the idea? vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:27): ancutagheorghe: re reputation it's a more generic (and very interesting) domain. It can be used for antispam but it can also be used as a social feature in xwiki. One thing I'd look at is Mediawiki since they have a great need for antispam tools so there are good ideas to take there I'm sure vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:27): doing a mediawiki antispam tool analysis is a must IMO ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:30): vmassol i am sorry i am not familiar with what does reputation mean in this context vmassol - (28/03/2009 20:30): ancutagheorghe: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reputation ancutagheorghe - (28/03/2009 20:31): oh i understand, thanks a lot !
